about.title: About Me
about.description: Hello, I am a front-end developer specializing in React, Vue, and modern web technologies. I am actively seeking new opportunities and open to freelance projects.

project1.title: OKKI CRM System
project1.description: Led the development of the email module, supporting a micro-frontend architecture for medium to large clients.

project2.title: Weiband Assistant
project2.description: A digital operation platform for enterprise clients, integrating marketing, customer service, and client management features.
